name: Wikipedia - Cleaner text
description:
...
A standalone "toggle" style for Wikipedia which...

(1) hides all superscript references in the article and...
(2) colors all links navy (tweak this depending on whatever theme(s) you've got going). 

Massively practical for when you're wanting to copy-paste text and not have to clean up the reference superscript text.

A perfect fit with the "Minimalist Wikipedia 1911" theme:

https://userstyles.org/styles/126057/minimalist-wikipedia-1911
...
